data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Aceh to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aceh, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Aceh, Indonesia that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 152,339 believers in Aceh.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Aceh.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Malay, Singkil people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, make the 152,339 believers in Aceh to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,595,762 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Aceh, Indonesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 152,339 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
